context: I hope that my thoughts & prayers for you will show how much I love you & appreciate you. This is a amazing bible verse for you. "Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up."
Take my worries, Jesus, and give me the words to help others for you 😍📍 😍 Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. 😍 : the word gives you a peace that the world cannot, come to God with your troubles & how watch he heals what you thought was impossible 😍🙏

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. When we are dealing with someone whose heart stinks from worrying, let us try to speak a good word to help them to turn it over to God and trust Him.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up! We know that it is power & death in the tongue, that is why we speak nothing but positivity over JA's life and his family. We will continue to pray for his life as it is important. In Jesus name - Amen 😍🙏🌌

The hope we have in Christ isn't just wishful thinking or positive vibes. It's hope that's based on truth-on facts and faith. So what can we do? The Bible says: "Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up."
"Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." God is GREATER than my highs and lows

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. Discover the power of encouraging words and their impact on our well-being with Proverbs 12:25. This verse highlights the importance of speaking kindness and uplifting others, as it brings healing and boosts the spirits of both the giver and the receiver.

Blessed Risings ✨ Gotta get right in the spirit soon as you rise! Another powerful word today! 😍🙏🌌🙏 "Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." Don't worry, cast all anxieties on the Lord. Smile, show love, spread his word on TODAY 😍👫 🌌
Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. Do you know anyone weighed down by anxiety? Can you spare them a kind word today to cheer their heart. #BEKIND

i am still in awe that after the day i experienced, this was the "verse of the day". "Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." thank you all for contributing to the biblical, kind words that cheered me up and help.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. This is why I have embraced twitter; reading the stories of others has made an impact, the kind words, and the positive feedback has helped me to replace my anxiety with a "I Can Attitude." 😍🙏
Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. Even the bible addresses issues of mental health. Speak words of encouragement to anyone you notice is depressed or stressed.

and that's what matters. You trying is completely ok. I totally agree that Trying is the best way to go during Your tough times. Know that we Love you Miles 😍 "Anxiety weighs down the Heart, but a Kind word cheers it up."
Basically, with God's word gladness and contentment abound but this world rewards are worthless! Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. God, as I go about my day, help me to be on the lookout for people who might need a reminder of Your love and kindness. Use me to be a source.

"Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." A renervating word for someone seeing this tweet - God sees what you are going through and watches over you, and in due time, He would come through; just trust that He is able to do.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. We can't always control what happens to us, but we can choose our response. We must decide who who we'll trust and how we'll spend our lives. 😍👇🌌🙏 😍👇🌌🙏 😍👇🌌🙏 😍👇🌌🙏 😍👇🌌🙏 😍👇🌌🙏 Give your life to Christ and watch your life unfold before your eyes. His is love! Praise the lord! Glory to god! 😍🙏🌌 😍🙌🌌 😍
"Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." Be a vessel of mercy and make someone smile with a kind word. The world already has its own troubles, be kind.
Be nice to people. Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. ANXIETY WE ARE TOLD IS AT AN ALL TIME HIGH. WHY? COVID, INFLATION, LAWLESSNESS? OR IS IT THE CRAZY THINGS WE SEE GOING ON AROUND US. LACK OF COMMON SENSE, RUDENESS, JOBS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY, PEOPLE NOT TAKING RESOONSIBILITY FOR THEIR ACTIONS? HOW CAN WE CHANGE THIS? GOD WANTS OUR FOCUS ON HIM AND DOING WHAT HE TEACHES US... THEN ANXIETY CAN BE DRIVEN AWAY. GOD'S WORD IT THE GOOD WORD WE NEED!
Say something NICE to help someone today, for no reason!!! Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up.

"Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." #WordOfTheDay Some translations say "kind word" while others more accurately say "good." It's only one who is good & that's God. God is His Word. So it's God's Word that help. #God
Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. Our leaders put us through so much anxiety daily: climate change, racism, inflation... God will provide a restful heart.

Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. Let your words bless and not curse. Let them encourage and not put down. Let them caution and not insult. Life has shown everyone shege one way or the other, be kind with your words. It's free 😍.
"Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." Your words have power, use them to uplift and inspire... spread light in a world that needs it!

"Anxiety weighs down the Heart, but a Kind word cheers it up." There's always something to worry about: shaky finances, relational brokenness, jobs, health, mistakes, lifestyle etc. And it may not always be our fault.

Doomscrolling depressing/scary news on social media often has serious negative effects, but filling our social media newsfeeds with biblical encouragement can bless us immensely:Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up
Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up. Send these words to someone feeling anxious and help calm their nerves and may you have a great weekend.

"Anxiety weighs down the heart, but a kind word cheers it up." You have no idea how powerful your words can be. Never say anything negative about your spouse. Use your words to lift them up, encourage and love them. #marriage
